ModMetaData.name: Drag and Drop Work Tab
ModMetaData.author: Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
Replaces the Work tab with an overhauled version incorporating a drag and drop interface.
Includes a Colonist Stats secondary window for easy sorting and stats comparison.
There are tooltips for nearly everything in the new interface, from drag tips to stats, disabilities etc. (similar to the vanilla tab).
Includes an options menu (<color=orange>Options > Mod Settings</color>).
<color=red>This mod is incompatible with other Work Tab mods.</color>
